solution_line_template: She spends {days_per_week_delivery} * {hours_per_delivery_time} hours = <<{days_per_week_delivery}*{hours_per_delivery_time}={hours_per_week}>>{hours_per_week} hours per week delivering flyers.
She has spent a total of {hours_per_week} hours/week * {weeks_delivered} weeks = <<{hours_per_week}*{weeks_delivered}={total_hours_delivered}>>{total_hours_delivered} hours delivering flyers.
She has earned a total of {total_hours_delivered} hours * ${hourly_rate}/hour = $<<{total_hours_delivered}*{hourly_rate}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}.
